duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for providing an industry leading client service experience both in person and on the phone through the development and expansion of new and existing client relationships.
Provides financial solutions that meet client needs based on consultative conversations and referrals to other business partners for additional business growth opportunities.
Cross-trained to support teller transactions as needed.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent education

SAFE (Mortgage Licensing Act) compliance within 30 days of employment in this role, including new or transfer of registration and applicable NMLS background check, successful candidates must also meet ongoing regulatory requirements
